def Dir.uglob(pattern, must_find = false)
  paths = Dir.glob(pattern)
  if must_find && paths.length < 1
    raise RuntimeError,
      "no path matching #{pattern} found",
      caller
  end
  if paths.length > 1
    raise RuntimeError,
      "more than one path matching #{pattern} found: #{paths.join(' ')}",
      caller
  end
  paths.last
end
